nodes.title: Understand Yourself: Resources To Increase Your Self Awareness
nodes.desc: To understand yourself, take the big five personality test, and follow the featured shadow work guide

nodes.title: Improve Your Social Skills With These Timeless and Evidence-Based Resources
nodes.desc: Find the answer to any of your social problems through The Science of People, and read How to Win Friends and Influence People

nodes.title: Knowledge Management: The Best Resources to Teach you How to Organize Your Mind
nodes.desc: Featuring organization models from Tiago Forte's Building a Second Brain and an alternative research Model from Roamresearch

nodes.title: Master Effective and Persuasive Public Speaking: The Only Resources You Need
nodes.desc: Join Toastmasters, get inspired by Scott Young's blog post, and learn the best tips from the science of people.

nodes.title: How to Learn Anything: Every Effective Resource on Learning that Challenges Conventional Wisdom
nodes.desc: Cal Newport's blog StudyHacks and Scott Young contain the best evidence based and anecdotal resources on how to learn anything effectively.

nodes.title: How Succeed in Your Pursuit of a Meaningful Career: Timeless and Evidence Based Resources
nodes.desc: 80000 Hours is the go to resource to find out the best career for you, how to succeed in your career and to find detailed career descriptions. Waitbutwhy also has an insightful blog post on picking a career

nodes.title: The Best Resources on Writing: All the Essential Rules You Need to Know
nodes.desc: The best writing advice for 2020, featuring prominent bloggers such as James Clear and David Perell.

nodes.title: The Best Resources on Habit Formation: Evidence based and Actionable
nodes.desc: The definitive evidence based guide to forming and breaking habits
